31 ALKERMES •  CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY REPORT • SOCIALhave included the planting of a pollinator-friendly garden, 
partnerships with local conservation organizations such 
as Athlone Wildlife Apiaries and Coosan Men’s Shed, and 
participation in community-led projects that support wildlife 
in and around Athlone. 
• In 2021, Alkermes again partnered with the local secondary 
school in Athlone as part of a government-sponsored 
program to support educational inclusion. This long-running 
partnership aims to prepare students for the working world while also improving school retention rates for at-risk 
students by creating a link between education and future 
employment opportunities. In 2021, the program was 
adapted for a slightly younger audience and rebranded as 
the ‘World of Work’ program. It involved four sessions 
supported by Alkermes employees that focused on teaching 
practical skills and providing first-hand insights into real-
world work environments.
